entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Convert.ToDateTime reports that the error was not handled by the user when using the handler #81622
  • Failed to read NuGet.Config due to unauthorized access. #81619
  • XmlSerializer: provide more details in error message "Compiling JScript/CSharp scripts is not supported" #81613
  • [Mono] An assertion that Android hit when using LLVM 14 with AOT #81610
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Vector128.ShuffleUnsafe #81609
    8.0.0
  • Unable to sign StandardOptimizationData.mibc #81601
  • Missing copyright header in some runtime binaries #81600
  • Arm VectorTableLookup and VectorTableExtension - Part 2 #81599
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient on .NET 7 does not pass windows credentials to endpoint #81595
    8.0.0
  • IHttpClientFactory change HttpClientHandler credentials #81594
  • .net core runtime does not load two version of same assembly #81593
  • [NativeAOT] Usages of generic `EqualityComparer.Default` have cctor init checks for primitives #81592
    Future
  • Inconsistent behavior in `SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient` across win/linux #81590
    8.0.0
  • Unhandled exception inside Interop+OpenSsl.AlpnServerSelectCallback causing the process crash #81588
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.UpgradeToGeneratedRegexAnalyzerTests.NoDiagnosticsForNet60(invocationType: StaticMethods) #81586
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Vector4Tests.Vector4DistanceTest1 #81585
  • NativeAot publish fail #81584
  • Adding `global.json` version is causing `dotnet` to not run tool on linux when not using `tool run` #81580

Closed

  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check for anonymous authentication #78459
    8.0.0
  • HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args are not respected if DisableDefaults=true #81445
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!tree->IsUnusedValue() || (dstCount != 0)' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #81356
  • SslStream_NegotiateClientCertificateAsyncTls13_Succeeds fails on non-portable builds with OpenSSL 3.0 #81546
    8.0.0
  • JIT: build pred lists early, persist them throughout compilation #80193
    8.0.0
  • Console app wont load if AspNetCore runtime is not installed #81554
  • System.Text.Json JsonSerializer.Deserialize has no support to handle missing fields #81597
  • Support targeting iOS platforms with ILCompiler #80908
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Generate StandardOptimizationData uncompressed #81623
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: rename flowList to FlowEdge and encapsulate all fields #81621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter field op refactorings; fixes #81558 #81620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix -Wformat violations #81618
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] insertion of enabled MSBuild Server by default #81617
  • Upstream a few changes from the NativeAOT-LLVM branch #81616
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Relax reg-optionality validity checks #81614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Linux NativeAOT debug info regression test #81612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove duplicated code #81611
    area-Debugger-mono
  • EnableAotAnalyzer by default for src libraries #81608
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger]fix side effect of the symbol server PR #81606
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: fix issue with partial comp pred list maintenance #81605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix pal tests build on osx-arm64 #81604
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make internal FrozenHashTable non-generic #81603
    area-System.Collections
  • Split Mono manifest creation into a separate subset #81598
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • add RIDs for Wolfi #81589
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • WIP: Eliminate estimation and double use emitOutputInstr() #81587
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix warnings found with new analyzer CA1860: Prefer Length/Count/IsEmpty property check over Any() #81583
    area-Meta

Merged

  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check (#78459) #80636
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Respect HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args when DisableDefaults=true #81568
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Update the assert to correctly check if a tree with value has non-zero destination registers #81412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix OOM edge case in interleaved LoaderHeap #81602
    area-VM-coreclr
  • pal_ssl: include missing code for non-portable OpenSSL 3.0 build. #81596
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: revise checking for computed preds #81582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove AggressiveInlining from XxHash128.HashLength0To16 #81565
    area-System.IO
  • Use eager evaluation when configuring the JsonTypeInfo type graph. #81576
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Remove JsonMetadataServices dependency from DeserializeAsyncEnumerable #81579
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Support targeting iOS platforms with ILCompiler #81476
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not print stack trace if error reading crashReportJsonFile #81467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Do not expect quic to work on single file deployments #81581
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • CI: Update darc dependency to track emsdk manifest name change #81556
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Implement more opcodes in the jiterpreter #81575
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: remove cheap preds #81562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Suppress clang-16 warnings #81573
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Generate StandardOptimizationData uncompressed #81624
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2104346 #81359
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Prep for new diagnostic work and tests #81571
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Run nativeaot tests in helix #81439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Try to minimally light up Vector2, Vector3, Quaternion, and Plane for Mono SIMD #81541
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use MiniDumpWriteDump to create dumps on Windows #81509
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] EXPERIMENT - Folding GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR) => GT_LCL_VAR #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable AOT to print out the list of compiled methods #81567
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Prevent tests from importing "normal" NuGet props/targets #80573
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [QUIC] Added tests to check IsSupported. #81481
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch (i.e. start emitting cmov instructions) #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] wasi: Enable library tests on CI #81052
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • diagnostic to detect malformed format strings in lsg template message #81503
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary performance, in particular for strings #81557
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • Move all of the ref-pack generators to use the "LatestVS" Roslyn build so they don't pull in prebuilts in source-build #81561
    source-build, area-Infrastructure, dev-innerloop
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add direct pinvoke module variations #81548
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81350
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81349
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Add a simple size test #81517
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT instruction for NixOS #81485
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #81532
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update heap hard limit for large pages #81292
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #81295
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Create BitArray.HasAllSet() and .HasAnySet(). #81527
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT Fully implements warning suppressions logic #81266
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
